title: Bonus 16: After Life - Surviving the Apocalypse
itunes:title: Bonus: After Life - Surviving the Apocalypse
description: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I finish (for now) our series on the apocalyptic literature, with a discussion of how views on the afterlife changed in the Second Temple period.
content:encoded: In this co-released episode, Steve Guerra of the History of the Papacy podcast and I finish (for now) our series on the apocalyptic literature, with a discussion of how views on the afterlife changed in the Second Temple period.
itunes:subtitle: Changing views of the afterlife
itunes:author: Garry Stevens, Stephen Guerra
